channel.title: The music of Don Gillis
channel.description:
This series features the works of Don Gillis; hosted by the composer himself. Most of the performances are conducted by the composer.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Three symphonic movements
item.description: This program features three slow symphonic movements composed by Don Gillis.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: The libretto, Part 1
item.description: The Libretto, Part 1. An opera about a composer who needs a libretto to write an opera about.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Two compositions for band
item.description: This program focuses on a pair of Don Gillis' compositions for band.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Music for concert band
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions for concert band.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Symphony 5 1/2, a Symphony for Fun and more
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis', "Symphony 5 1/2," as well as some of his other compositions.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Pops potpourri
item.description: This program focuses on six short compositions by Don Gillis.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Symphony No. 7
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' Symphony No. 7.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Works for chorus and soloists
item.description: This program features several works by Don Gillis for choral groups and soloists.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Compositions for bands
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions for bands.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Additional selections
item.description: This program features a varied selection of Don Gillis' compositions.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Thomas Wolfe, American
item.description: This performance of Thomas Wolfe, American features Dr. James Pfohl and the Transylvania Symphony Orchestra. Also featured is a performance of Paul Bunyan: Overture to a Legend.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: The Alamo and Tulsa
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions The Alamo and Tulsa.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Ranch House Party and more
item.description: This program features performances of Don Gillis' work "Ranch House Party" and more.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Music for narrator and orchestra
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions for narrator and orchestra.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Peachstreet Promenade and more
item.description: This program focuses on some of composer Don Gillis' favorite compositions, including Peachtree Promenade.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Works with soloists
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' compositions that feature soloists.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Music for marching band
item.description: Music for Marching Band. The Mighty Mac, by National High School Band of Interlochen; Ballet for Band by University of Illinois Band; Minuetcera by United States Army Band.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Symphony No. 5 and more
item.description: National High School Band of Interlochen performs the first and final movements of Don Gillis' Symphony No. 5, as well as A Short Overture to an Unwritten Opera and a soliloquy for strings.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Shindig
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gillis' composition, Shindig.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: The composer's favorites
item.description: Don Gillis plays his own favorite compositions and explains why.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Various selections
item.description: This program features a varied selection of Don Gillis' compositions.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Lone Star: A Rhapsody for Band and Suite: Saga of a Pioneer
item.description: This program features performances of Loine Star: A Rhapsody for Band and Suite: Saga of a Pioneer. Includes discussion on writing for band. Music played by University Band of Interlochen and University of Illinois Band.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: The Land of Wheat
item.description: This program focuses on Don Gilis' composition, The Land of Wheat.

item.title: The libretto, Part 2
item.description: The Libretto, Part 2. Conclusion of previous program.

item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Christmas special, part one
item.description: Christmas Special #1. The Night Before Christmas; The Coming of the King.
item.dc:creator: Gillis, Don, 1912-1978

item.title: Inspiration of jazz
item.description: This program focuses on the influence of jazz on the compositions of Don Gillis.
